thread.title: Les
thread.title_full: Remitly | Send Money Home reviewed by Les

author: Les
title: Les
text:
I will not send money using remitly anymore . They promise and their promotion is to have a $30 gift card for the 1st timer to send money, so I did try sending money in the philippines, I emailed them asking where's my $30 gift card . They said oh because our promotion is to like this like that .
Very bad experience and sorry to say but that's true .
